itunes:title: Episode 759 - Special Guest Sam Morril
title: Episode 759 - Special Guest Sam Morril
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by stand up comic Sam Morril to talk about what it was like having a cameo in ‘Joker’ and hanging out with Joaquin Phoenix on set, doing comedy during COVID and in the shadow of PC culture, why audiences gravita...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by stand up comic Sam Morril to talk about what it was like having a cameo in ‘Joker’ and hanging out with Joaquin Phoenix on set, doing comedy during COVID and in the shadow of PC culture, why audiences gravitated toward Joe Rogan, and the insincerity of Hollywood’s progressivism — plus Sam tells the story of the time an audience member smashed a pint glass over his head.
